trans-unit.source: Represents the mouse device to a specific thread.
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标设备表示为特定线程。

trans-unit.source: The Mouse class provides mouse related events, methods and, properties which provide information regarding the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标类提供鼠标相关的事件、 方法和属性，提供有关鼠标状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: Each event that Mouse defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> as a new routed event.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标定义由基元素类还重新公开附加的事件的每个事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为新的路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Generally, it is more convenient to handle mouse events for an application on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>, rather than using the Mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，会更方便，若要处理的应用程序的鼠标事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>，而不是使用鼠标事件。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The static members of the Mouse class delegate to the primary <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> of the calling thread's input manager.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标类的静态成员委托给主<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>调用线程的输入管理器。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseWheel> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler.
Captures mouse input to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标输入捕获到指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.
To release mouse capture, call Capture passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用捕获传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: 如果捕获了鼠标时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>引发事件并输入不转到下鼠标，元素<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>首先引发。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: 这可使捕获的元素有机会前释放捕获<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果元素能够捕获鼠标;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标输入捕获到指定的元素使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，光标是否在其边框内。

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A>传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: 如果捕获了鼠标时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>引发事件并输入不转到下鼠标，元素<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>首先引发。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: 这可使捕获的元素有机会前释放捕获<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
The capture policy to use.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果元素能够捕获鼠标;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that has captured the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取已捕获鼠标的元素。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标仅在拖放操作过程通常在这种方式中捕获和捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。

trans-unit.source: The element captured by the mouse.
Gets the element the mouse pointer is directly over.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标指针位于正上方的元素。

trans-unit.source: Controls can be composed of multiple elements.
trans-unit.target: 控件可由多个元素构成。

trans-unit.source: DirectlyOver reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself.
trans-unit.target: DirectlyOver 报告中鼠标指针位于复合控件和控件本身的特定元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> the pointer is over, the DirectlyOver property could report the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，具体情况取决于哪个部分的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>鼠标指针位于、 DirectlyOver 属性可能会报告<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>确定鼠标是否位于元素，包括其可视子元素或控件复合元素。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an element has mouse capture, the mouse pointer is considered directly over the element regardless of the where the mouse pointer is.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有鼠标捕获，鼠标指针被视为直接通过该元素中，而不考虑 where 鼠标指针位于。

trans-unit.source: The element the mouse pointer is over.
Retrieves up to 64 previous coordinates of the mouse pointer since the last mouse move event.
trans-unit.target: 自上一个鼠标移动事件以来检索最多为 64 以前鼠标指针坐标。

trans-unit.source: The elements `points` are in relation to.
An array of objects.
The number of points returned.
Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定元素相对的鼠标位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified element with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针的位置将相对于元素的起点，0，0 的左上角的指定元素计算。

trans-unit.source: During drag-and-drop operations, the position of the mouse cannot be reliably determined through GetPosition.
trans-unit.target: 在拖放操作期间的鼠标位置不能可靠地确定通过 GetPosition。

trans-unit.source: This is because control of the mouse (possibly including capture) is held by the originating element of the drag until the drop is completed, with much of the behavior controlled by underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] calls.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为在放置操作完成，其中许多由基础控制行为之前，鼠标 （可能包括捕获） 的控制由拖动的原始元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]调用。

trans-unit.source: Try the following approaches instead: - Call the <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.GetPosition%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs> that is passed to the drag events (<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave>).
trans-unit.target: 改为尝试以下方法:-调用<xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.GetPosition%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs>传递给拖动事件 (<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter>， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver>， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave>)。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter> </xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.GetPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Call [GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp), using P/Invoke.
The coordinate space in which to calculate the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 中要计算的鼠标位置的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: 相对于参数的鼠标位置 relativeTo 。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture> attached event.
Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event.
trans-unit.target: 路由的事件标识符是在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时创建的。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.
trans-unit.target: 你通常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets the state of the left button of the mouse.
The state of the left mouse button.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> attached event.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets the state of the middle button of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标中键的鼠标的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the middle mouse button.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> attached event.

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> attached event.

Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event.

trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove> attached event.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Represents the number of units the mouse wheel is rotated to scroll one line.
trans-unit.target: 表示鼠标滚轮转动的单位数滚动一行。

trans-unit.source: In the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the value of this field is 120.
trans-unit.target: 在当前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，此字段的值为 120 个。

trans-unit.source: The intention of the field exposure is to allow for vendors to build finer-resolution mouse wheels in the future, that perhaps would include a freely rotating wheel without notches.
trans-unit.target: 公开此字段的目的是为了让供应商以生成更好地解析鼠标轮将来，可能会包含不带齿格自由地旋转滚轮。

trans-unit.source: The expectation is that such a device would send more messages per rotation, but with a smaller value in each message.
trans-unit.target: 应当是此类设备将每条消息中发送更多的消息，每次旋转，但具有较小值。

trans-unit.source: To support this possibility, you should either add the incoming delta values until the MouseWheelDeltaForOneLine amount is reached (so for a delta-rotation you get the same response), or scroll partial lines in response to the more frequent messages.
trans-unit.target: 支持这种可能性，则应将添加的传入的增量值直至 MouseWheelDeltaForOneLine 量达到 （因此的增量旋转你收到相同的响应），或向下滚动到更频繁的消息的响应中的部分行。

trans-unit.source: You could also choose your own scroll granularity and accumulate deltas of your own choosing until that delta is reached, or perhaps reference user-controllable system parameters for mouse sensitivity and extrapolate these to mouse wheel delta thresholds.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以选择自己滚动粒度并聚合的你自己选择增量，直到该增量，为止，或可能引用鼠标敏感度的用户可以控制系统参数并推断这些到鼠标滚轮增量阈值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel> attached event.
Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event.
trans-unit.target: 路由的事件标识符是在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时创建的。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.
trans-unit.target: 你通常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置整个应用程序的光标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> that OverrideCursor is set to will be applied to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>OverrideCursor 设置为将应用于整个应用程序。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To clear the override <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, set OverrideCursor to `null`.
Setting OverrideCursor to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A> will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 OverrideCursor<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>将强制的鼠标光标不显示，但仍然处理鼠标事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>

trans-unit.source: The override cursor or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the OverrideCursor is not set.
trans-unit.target: 重写的光标或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果 OverrideCursor 未设置。

Gets the primary mouse device.
This property supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性支持的 Windows Presentation Foundation 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The device.

Gets the state of the right button.
trans-unit.target: 获取右侧的按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the right mouse button.
Sets the mouse pointer to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标指针设置为指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cursor being set does not apply to any particular element, but rather it applies to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的光标不适用于任何特定的元素，但它而是适用于整个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: So, if after setting the cursor the mouse pointer moves over an object which sets the cursor, the cursor will be changed again.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果在设置后鼠标指针移过的对象设置光标的光标，光标将再次更改。

trans-unit.source: To force the mouse pointer to a specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> and to force this <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> on all elements, set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.OverrideCursor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制鼠标指针指向特定<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>以及强制这<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>上所有元素，设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.OverrideCursor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.OverrideCursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To set the cursor on a specific element, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> property on either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的特定元素的光标，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>其中一种<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>属性</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the base elements, see the [Base Elements Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.
trans-unit.target: 要将鼠标指针设置到的光标。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the cursor was set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设置游标;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.
Forces the mouse cursor to be updated.
Gets the state of the first extended button.
trans-unit.target: 获取第一个扩展按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the first extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 第一个鼠标扩展的按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended button.
trans-unit.target: 获取第二个扩展按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the second extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 第二个鼠标扩展的按钮的状态。
